name: Molnar
description: Recreation of one of Vera Molnárs artworks. The code was inspired by Garrits molnar.js but modified. The main idea was to make it pop with some motion and color. By playing around with the code I managed to randomize the color of each stroke and make the artwork flicker.

name: Molnar Roses
description: Modification of one of Vera Molnárs artworks. The code was inspired by Garrits molnar.js but modified to look like roses instad of squares. The main idea was to recreate it using different forms. By playing around with the code I managed to change the bakground and the stroke to different kinds of red and with the help of ChatGPT i created the look of roses.

name: Neon Gravel (Scotter)
description: Recreation of Gravel (Scotter) by George Nees. The idea was to recreate Nees's work but with a twist and it somehow reminded me of Tetris, which is why I wanted the neon look. The code was created using ChatGPT and modified by me.

name: Broken Gravel (Scotter)
description: Recreation of Gravel (Scotter) by George Nees. The idea was to recreate Nees's work but with a twist, resulting in changing the geometry and the type of distorsion. The further down the more distorted the circles are. The code was created using ChatGPT and modified by me.

name: Gravity Gravel (Scotter)
description: Try klicking on the artwork! Modification of Gravel (Scotter) by George Nees. The idea was to recreate Nees's work but with a twist and it somehow reminded me of Tetris, which is why I wanted the neon look. The code was created using ChatGPT and modified by me.

name: Perlin Noise Polka Dots
description: Recreation of Garrit's noise example. I played around with colors, sizes and the noise.

name: Perlin Noise Grid
description: Recreation of Garrit's noise example. I wanted to display it in a grid where each scare is animated independently. I then played around with forms, colors and sizes.

name: Exploding spiral particles
description: Try clicking on the artwork! Modification of Garrit's particle example 01. Instead of fireworks I wanted the particles to explode in a spiral. I used the help of ChatGPT to understand where to change the code in order to meet my goals.

name: Cherry blossom particles
description: Try clicking on the artwork! Modification of Garrit's particle example 02. Instead of fireworks I wanted it to look like blooming cherry blossom flowers. I used the help of ChatGPT to understand where to change the code in order to meet my goals and played around with the color and amount of petals.

name: Flow field
description: Modification of Garrit's Flow field example 03. I added a trail to each stroke and changed the stroke color. I used the help of ChatGPT to help with the modifications in order to meet my goals and then played around myself with the code.

name: Bouncy ball
description: Try clicking on the artwork! Modification of Garrit's Force example 02 with implication of Tone.js. Each time the ball bounced off the ground I wanted it to make a sound using Tone.js. I used the help of ChatGPT to help with the understanding and adding the sound and then played around myself with the code.
